Classes/GeoFirestore.html.name: GeoFirestore
Classes/GeoFirestore.html.abstract: A GeoFirestore instance is used to store geo location data at a Firestore document.

Classes/GFSQuery.html.name: GFSQuery
Classes/GFSQuery.html.abstract: A GFSQuery object handles geo queries in a Firestore collection.
